title: How do I get rid of new "call emergency services" overlay on Pixel 2 XL running 10?
content: I updated my Pixel 2 XL to Android 10 the other day, and somewhere along the way, I must have approved an addition to one of my lock screens. I now have 2 red bands with links to "call emergency services" and "send SMS alert". I've already accidentally hit the SMS button and got a warning countdown that it was going to call 911 unless I cancelled because I don't have emergency contacts set up. I don't need this function because I use the Medical ID app. Problem is, I have no idea what I activated, and no idea what to search for to turn it off. Any help would be appreciated!
